definition: to see/to meet/to appear (to be sth)/to interview
to forage/to hunt for food/to scavenge/fig. to make a living
to seek happiness elsewhere (euphemism for extramarital sex)/a bit on the side
to search for the right word (of poet)
to travel far and wide looking for sth, only to find it easily
pinyin: ta4 po4 tie3 xie2 wu2 mi4 chu4 , de2 lai2 quan2 bu4 fei4 gong1 fu5
containing_words.word: 踏破铁鞋无觅处，得来全不费工夫

definition: lit. lock the door and search for the right word (idiom); fig. the serious hard work of writing
see 騎驢找驢|骑驴找驴[qi2 lu:2 zhao3 lu:2]

definition: deep and somber/see also 窈窈[yao3 yao3]
